name: Mordred Basic Attack Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of Mourning, Clarent, Clarent, Mourning with a 1, 0.75, 0.75, 1x swing time. Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 1.92m Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage : 44 + 2.42 per level Mourning Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Clarent Damage Scaling : 100% Intelligence + 60% Strength Ability Video Passive - Wrath of the Forsaken Notes: Hitting enemy gods with abilities provides 2 Wrath and 1 for basic attacks. Hitting enemy minions provides 1 Wrath. Gain 1 Wrath every 4s. passively. Wrath can only be gained once per ability per enemy hit. Mordred can hit enemies to gain Wrath. His Ultimate Ability Heart Slash can only be used after reaching 40 Wrath. His Ultimate Ability Pursue the Weak can only be used after reaching 80 Wrath. After using an ability or attacking, Mordred's Interact key becomes a Dash forward. This deals Physical Damage and Knocks Back the first enemy god hit. Ability Video 1st Ability - Cruel Strikes Notes: Line attack deals Bonus damage on hit if Mourning is next in the basic attack chain. Line attack Heals you on hit if Clarent is next in the basic attack chain. Lower healing on hitting enemy minions. Line attack Heals you on hit if Clarent is next in the basic attack chain. Mordred strikes twice with his swords. Mordred first slashes, dealing 75 [45% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in front of Mordred. Mordred then slams, dealing 85 [65% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in a line and either dealing [40% Protections] Bonus Damage or 45% [Protections] Healing , based on Mordred's Basic Attack Chain. Cost: 45/50/55/60/65 mana Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10 seconds Slash Radius: 4 meters Slash Angle: 90 degrees Slam Range: 4 meters Slam Radius: 0.75 meters Slash Damage and Scaling : 55/80/105/130/155 + 45% Strength Slam Damage and Scaling : 55/80/105/130/155 + 65% Strength Bonus Damage : 40% Protections Heal : 45% Protections Minion Heal : 10/15/20/25/30 Ability Video 2nd Ability - Bloodrage Notes: Physical Protection buff and debuff stacks up to 4 times. Mordred deals 70 [60% Strength and 40% Intelligence] Physical Damage to enemies around Mordred, then gains increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed . While buffed, basic attack hits on enemies reduce their Physical Protections and increase his own . Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana Cooldown: 14 seconds Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 50/90/130/170/210 Damage Scaling : 50% Strength and 40% Intelligence Attack Speed : 40% Movement Speed : 12/14/16/18/20% Protection : 4/5/6/7/8 Buff Duration : 4 seconds Protection Reduced : -4/-5/-6/-7/-8 Debuff Duration : 4 seconds Ability Video 3rd Ability - Severing Slice Notes: Enemy gods are damaged for every 1.25m they move. Minions take damage over time instead of due to movement. Mordred fires a projectile that deals 55 [70% Intelligence] Physical Damage and Slows enemies. Direct hits with the center of the projectile cause targets to Bleed, taking 25 [12% Strength] Bonus Damage as they move. Cost: 40/50/60/70/80 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Range: 9.6 meters Radius: 0.6 meters Inner Radius: 0.2 meters Damage and Scaling : 55/85/115/145/175 + 50% Intelligence Bleed Damage and Scaling : 20/25/30/35/40 + 10% Strength Minion Damage and Scaling : 10/15/20/25/30 + 5% Strength Slow : 30% Debuff Duration : 2.5 seconds Ability Video Ultimate - Heart Slash Notes: Ability repeatedly deals damage every 0.3s. over 1.5 seconds. You are Slowed while Channeling. Mordred deala 100 [75% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in an area in front of Mordred. If you he hits an enemy god, they are Rooted . Mordred then channels to siphon their lifeforce, gaining a 160 Health Shield and Healing over time for 10 [20% Intelligence] Healing ,  while dealing 30 [25% Intelligence] Physical Damage repeatedly to that enemy. Cost: 40 mana Cooldown: 20 seconds Range: 6 meters Radius: 1 meters Damage : 80/130/180/230/280 Damage Scaling : 70% Strength Damage Per Tick : 30/40/50/60/70 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 25% Strength Heal : 10/20/30/40/50 Heal Scaling : 20% Intelligence Shield Health : 160/200/240/280/320 Ability Video Alt. Ultimate - Pursue the Weak Notes: Charge lasts 4 seconds but will continue if within a wall, ending immediately when possible. Mordred gains vision of all enemies around him while Charging. If no enemy gods are able to be Displaced, the follow-up attack will not start. Mordred becomes CC Immune and charges forward, traveling through walls , stopping on the first enemy god hit. Nearby enemies take 170 [80% Strength and 75% Intelligence] Physical Damage and are Stunned . After a short delay, Mordred launches himself and Stunned enemies into the sky , repeatedly dealing 80 [20% Strength and 15% Intelligence] Physical Damage . Mordred gains 30 [25% Intelligence] Health per enemy god hit with this attack. Cost: 80 mana Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 150/200/250/300/350 Damage Scaling : 75% Strength and 75% Intelligence Damage Per Tick : 70/90/110/130/150 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 15% Strength and 15% Intelligence Stun Duration : 0.5 seconds Ability Video

Enemy Gods can step in front of this projectile to be hit by it instead of the selected god. You can cancel this ability anytime before firing, the costs and cooldown will not be consumed. Channel to begin charging an attack and lock on to an enemy God. Reactivate to fire a homing projectile at the selected God that deals Physical Damage and Stuns . name: Nemesis Basic Attack Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 0.75, 1.25x damage and swing time. Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 1.92 meters Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage : 43 + 2.32 per level Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Scales of Fate Hitting enemies with Basic Attacks reduces the target's Inhand Power, Strength, and Intelligence while increasing Nemesis's. Reduction Per Stack : 7% Increase Per Stack : 7% Max Stacks : 3 Duration : 5 seconds Ability Video 1st Ability - Swift Vengeance Notes: May use Basic Attacks and Abilities between dashes. Nemesis Dashes in a line, passing through all enemies. Deals 50 [35% Strength] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Nemesis may dash again within 2 seconds. Cost: 50 mana Cooldown: 11 seconds Range: 4.8 meters Radius: 1.6 meters Damage : 50/80/110/140/170 Damage Scaling : 35% Strength Ability Video 2nd Ability - Slice and Dice Nemesis slashes in a cone, dealing 70 [40% Strength and 25% Intelligence] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Enemies in the center of the slash take 100 [80% Strength and 75% Intelligence] Physical Damage and are Slowed . Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 10 seconds Range: 5.6 meters Center Cone Angle: 45 degrees Damage : 70/100/130/160/190 Damage Scaling : 40% Strength and 25% Intelligence Center Damage : 100/160/220/280/340 Center Damage Scaling : 80% Strength and 75% Intelligence Slow : 30% Slow Duration : 2 seconds Ability Video 3rd Ability - Retribution Notes: Hard Crowd Control removes the Shield . Nemesis gains a 100 [7% MaxHealth] Health Shield for a duration. Heals 50% [10% Intelligence] of the damage taken during the effect. Nemesis reflects 40% [20% Strength] of the damage taken from gods as Physical Damage . Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12 seconds Shield Health : 100/150/200/250/300 Shield Health Scaling : 7.5% Max Health Reflect Damage : 40% of the damage blocked Reflect Damage Scaling : 20% Strength Heal : 50% of the damage blocked Heal Scaling : 10% Intelligence Shield Duration : 2 seconds Ability Video Ultimate - Divine Judgement Notes: Gains Protections equal to the enemy with the most Protections. Gain Protections equal to the enemy. On hitting an enemy, a homing projectile spawns from them, granting the buffs when it reaches Nemesis. Nemesis chooses a single enemy god, dealing 10% of their Current Health [45% Strength and 65% Intelligence] as Physical Damage to them and all enemies in an area around them. Nemesis gains Movement Speed and a percentage of the enemy's Protections . Reduces enemy's Movement Speed and Protections by the same amount. name: Nu Wa Basic Attack Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage Scaling : 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Strength of Wood Every 12s your next Basic Attack will Root all targets hit. Damaging an enemy god with a Basic Attack will reduce this cooldown by 1s. Root Duration: 1s Cooldown: 0s Cost: 0s Ability Video 1st Ability - Mysterious Fog Notes: Nu Wa sends a dense fog slowly forward that deals 50 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage when it touches an enemy. Enemies that remain in the fog take additional damage every second. You and Allied Gods are Stealthed when inside the fog. Gain Strength of Water, which gives you Movement Speed . Allied gods that enter the fog gain Strength of Water. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 10 seconds Range: 25 meters Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 50/75/100/125/150 Damage Scaling : 50% Intelligence Damage Per Tick : 10/20/30/40/50 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 15% Intelligence Movement Speed : 10% Buff Duration : 4s Ability Video 2nd Ability - Clay Soldiers Notes: If you have not chosen a target, Clay Soldiers will attack the nearest enemy or an enemy god that damages Nu Wa. Nu Wa summons Clay Soldiers to attack the chosen target. Clay Soldiers will dash at enemies within 4.8 meters, dealing Magical Damage , then begin to basic attack. Clay Soldiers last for 10s. Gain Strength of Earth, which gives you Penetration . Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 16 seconds Range: 6.4m Radius: 1.6m Dash Damage : 10/15/20/25/30 Dash Damage Scaling : 2.5% Intelligence Basic Attack Damage : 20/30/40/50/60 Number Conjured : 2/2/2/2/3 Flat Penetration : 8/11/14/17/20 Soldier Health : 100 + 15% Max Health Buff Duration : 5s Ability Video 3rd Ability - Shining Metal Notes: Projectile passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through walls. Nu Wa launches a projectile dealing 90 [65% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies it passes through. If the projectile hits a Clay Soldier it explodes, dealing damage in an area and Stunning enemies and towers. Gain Strength of Metal, causing your Basic Attack to deal Magical Damage in an area when you hit an enemy. Summon Fire Shards that deal 100 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage to each enemy god. Gain Strength of Fire, which causes your Basic Attacks to go farther and faster. name: Odin Basic Attack Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time. The final hit of the chain hits all targets in the area for 2x damage. Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 1.92 meters Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Path to Valhalla When a god dies, Odin gains a brief increase to his Movement Speed, Strength and Intelligence . Movement Speed : 4% Per Stack Strength : 10% Per Stack Intelligence : 10% Per Stack Buff Duration : 10 seconds Max Buff Stacks : 2 Ability Video 1st Ability - Lunge Odin Leaps forward, dealing 120 [75% Strength] Physical Damage to nearby enemies as he lands. If Odin has a Shield from Raven Shout, it explodes upon landing. Cost: 40/45/50/55/60 mana Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 2.4 meters Damage : 120/170/220/270/320 Damage Scaling : 75% Strength Ability Video 2nd Ability - Raven Shout Odin gains a 100 [40% Strength and 50% Intelligence] Health Shield for a duration. After the duration, the Shield explodes dealing Physical Damage equal to the remaining Shield Health to nearby enemies. If the Shield is at full HP when it explodes, it deals 100 Physical Damage instead. Cost: 45/50/55/60/65 mana Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12 seconds Explode Radius: 3.2 meters Full Shield Damage Increase : 15% Shield Health : 100/155/210/265/320 Shield Health Scaling : 40% Strength + 50% Intelligence Ability Video 3rd Ability - Gungnir's Might Notes: Projectile passes through and damages all targets, stops on the first God hit, and stops on walls. Odin charges up, pulsing damage around him, then throws his spear. The pulses deal 50 [60% Intelligence] Physical Damage and Slow enemies. The spear deals 60 [75% Strength] Physical Damage and Stuns if fired after two pulses. Can only stun the first god hit but pierces gods hit. If Odin refires the spear early, nearby allies get Attack Speed and this ability has a 40% reduced cooldown. Cost: 50/60/70/80/90 mana Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12 seconds Pulse Radius: 3.2 meters Projectile Range: 8.8 meters Projectile Radius: 0.48 meters Pulse Damage : 50/80/110/140/170 Pulse Damage Scaling : 60% Intelligence Projectile Damage : 60/115/170/225/280 Projectile Damage Scaling : 75% Strength Stun Duration : 0.9 seconds Attack Speed : 30/32.5/35/37.5/40% Buff Duration 4 seconds Ability Video Ultimate - Ring of Spears Notes: Ring of Spears does not block ally movement or projectiles, only enemy basic attacks and enemy God movement. The Ring is made of 8 Segments that each have 5 Hit Points. An enemy basic attack will deal 1 Hit Point per hit. If an enemy god dies inside the cage, gain a permanent Strength and Intelligence buff. Odin is immune to Slows and Roots while in the Ring. Odin creates a ring of spears that impedes enemies. Enemy gods who die in the ring grant Odin a permanent STR and INT buff. Max 10 Stacks. On casting, Odin will gain a stack of Path to Valhalla. Enemies in the area cannot Heal and have reduced Strength and Intelligence . Enemies who leave the area take 120 [75% Strength] Physical Damage and are Slowed , unless exiting through a segment of the ring destroyed by basic attacks. Cost: 100 mana Cooldown: 100/95/90/85/80 seconds Damage : 120/190/260/330/400 Damage Scaling : 75% Strength Slow : 25% Slow Duration : 5 seconds Strength : -15/-17.5/-20/-22.5/-25% Intelligence : -15/-17.5/-20/-22.5/-25% Strength : 5 Per Stack Intelligence : 8 Per Stack Ability Video

name: Princess Bari Basic Attack Notes: Projectiles stops on first enemy hit, and does not pass through walls. Fires a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Mystic Surge: Deals 50% Damage to enemies within 2.4m of where the projectile stops. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 degrees Damage Scaling : 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Mystic Surge Princess Bari accumulates Spirit by dealing damage to enemies. Upon reaching 100 Spirit Princess Bari enters Mystic Surge for 5s and can use any of her first 3 abilities with no cooldown. Abilities used this way have a bonus effect. Princess Bari gains Strength, Intelligence, and Attack Speed while in her Mystic Surge based on the rank of Spirit's Cadence. Minion Hit: 2 Spirit God Hit: 5 Spirit Strength : 7/14/21/28/35/49 Intelligence : 10/20/30/40/50/70 Attack Speed : 10/14/18/22/26/30% Ability Video 1st Ability - Spirit Bell Notes: Warding Gusts will push the Bell towards Princess Bari if it is within Basic Attack range and has landed before casting Warding Gusts. Princess Bari can only have 3 Bells deployed. Princess Bari lobs a bell, dealing 65 [80% Strength and 65% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies where it lands. Warding Gusts or Reverent Steps pushes the bell, dealing 45 [80% Strength and 65% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Slowing enemies hit. Mystic Surge: +20% Lob Damage , and now applies a Slow . +20% Rolling Damage and now applies Stun . The bell itself is 1.67x the size. Cost: 0 mana Cooldown: 15/14.5/14/13.5/13 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 2.4 meters Lob Damage : 65/105/145/185/225 Lob Damage Scaling : 80% Strength and 65% Intelligence Roll Damage : 45/75/105/135/165 Roll Damage Scaling : 80% Strength and 65% Intelligence Slow : 20% Slow Duration : 1.5s Ability Video 2nd Ability - Warding Gust Princess Bari swipes her fan dealing 65 [55% Strength and 45% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies and Knockbacks enemies who are close. -30% Damage to enemies further away. Mystic Surge: +20% Damage and Knockback . Bells pushed are treated as Mystic Surge Bells. Cost: 0 mana Cooldown: 14 seconds Radius: 4.4/8.8 meters Cone Angle: 70 degrees Damage : 65/110/155/200/245 Damage Scaling : 55% Strength and 45% Intelligence Ability Video 3rd Ability - Reverent Steps Notes: Princess Bari has no strafing or backpedal penalty while firing. Princess Bari dances for a short burst of speed in any direction, then fires a projectile dealing 10 [110% Strength and 40% Intelligence and 100% Inhand Power] Magical Damage when it ends. Hitting a god grants 50 Spirit and reduces this ability's Cooldown by 25%. Mystic Surge: +20% Damage , dealt instantly in a line. Bells pushed are treated as Mystic Surge Bells. Cost: 0 mana Cooldown: 15 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.64 meters Damage : 10/45/80/115/150 Damage Scaling : 95% Strength and 55% Intelligence and 100% Inhand Power Ability Video Ultimate - Spirit's Cadence Notes: Slow stacks three times. Gods can receive Guarding Spirits only once per Spirit Cadence use. Princess Bari conjures a spiritual dance that pulses three times. The first two pulses deal 50 [30% Strength and 25% Intelligence] Magical Damage The last pulse deals 100 [60% Strength and 70% Intelligence] Magical Damage . Pulses apply a stacking Slow . Princess Bari and her allies in the area gain Guarding Spirits for 4s. When taking lethal damage Princess Bari becomes Immune , Silenced , and Disarmed for 1.5s. Casting this ability immediately places Princess Bari in Mystic Surge for 10s. Cost: 0 mana Cooldown: 100 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 5.6 meters Pulse Damage : 50/70/90/110/130 Pulse Scaling : 30% Strength and 25% Intelligence Final Damage : 100/140/180/220/260 Final Damage Scaling : 60% Strength and 70% Intelligence Slow : 15% Slow Duration : 2s Ability Video

name: Rama Basic Attack Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Astral Quiver Notes: Rama can hold up to 5 Astral Arrows. Rama always respawns with a full Astral Quiver. Drop Chance : 30% + 1% Per Level Rama's Astral Quiver generates an Astral Arrow every 12s. Each Basic Attack reduces the time to generate an Astral Arrow by 2s. The first time a fired Astral Arrow hits an enemy, it has a chance to drop to the ground. Dropped Astral Arrows last for 10s, and picking one up restores 10 Mana. Ability Video 1st Ability - Astral Strike Notes: This ability allows your Basic Attacks to pass through all enemies and walls. This ability's bonus damage is reduced by 20% to each target hit after the first. Rama cannot toggle this ability if he has no Astral Arrows. Switch to a more powerful arrow that deals an additional 0 Physical Damage , pierces, and Slows enemies. While this ability is active, each Basic Attack consumes 1 Astral Arrow and Mana. Cost: 15 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Bonus Damage : 0/10/20/30/40 Bonus Damage Scaling : 0/15/15/15/15/15% Strength Slow : 0/10/10/10/10/10% Slow Duration : 0/1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5s Ability Video 2nd Ability - Infinite Arrows Rama focuses his mind and gain increased Attack Speed . When activating this ability, if there are any dropped Astral Arrows within 8.8m of Rama, he automatically collects them. While this buff is active, every third successful Basic Attack on an enemy god will immediately generate an Astral Arrow. Cost: 40/45/50/55/60 mana Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11 seconds Radius: 8.8 meters Attack Speed : 40/45/50/55/60% Buff Duration : 6 seconds Ability Video 3rd Ability - Rolling Assault Rama Rolls in the direction he is currently travelling. For the next 5s after rolling, his next Basic Attack will have Haste and consume an Astral Arrow, Crippling all enemies hit and dealing an additional 35 [30% Strength] Physical Damage . Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana Cooldown: 11 seconds Range: 7.2 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Bonus Damage : 35/55/75/95/115 Bonus Damage Scaling : 30% Strength Cripple Duration : 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2s Ability Video Ultimate - Astral Barrage Notes: Each time Rama picks up an Astral Arrow, the cooldown of this ability is reduced by 0.4s. Rama launches himself into the air for up to 5s and shoots 3 powerful arrows at the ground, with each successive shot dealing increasing Physical Damage while decreasing in size. Cost: 80 mana Cooldown: 90 seconds Radius: 2.4/1.6/1.2 meters Range: 32 meters Damage : 235/315/395/475/555 Damage Per Shot : 70/85/100% Ability Video

name: Sobek Basic Attack Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 1.92 meters Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage Scaling : 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Blessing of the Nile When Sobek attacks, he gains a stack of Protections . This effect stacks 3 times and lasts for 10s. An ability can only provide one stack per cast. Protections : 2 Protections Per Level : 0.4 Ability Video 1st Ability - Charge Prey Notes: Sobek has a 0s Postfire on a missed charge or a 0.3s postfire when he attempts to throw. This 0.3s postfire occurs both after a throw and if the enemy frees themselves with CC Immunity. Sobek dashes forward. The first enemy hit takes 70 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage and stops the dash. Sobek displaces the enemy behind him. Damaged enemies are Stunned before being thrown. Sobek is Displacement Immune while dashing and CC Immune while throwing. Cost: 70/75/80/85/90 mana Cooldown: 16 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage : 70/110/150/190/230 Damage Scaling : 50% Intelligence Stun Duration : 0.47 seconds Ability Video 2nd Ability - Tail Whip Notes: If you have not chosen a target, Clay Soldiers will attack the nearest enemy or an enemy god that damages Nu Wa. Sobek spins his tail, dealing 80 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage in an area around Sobek. Damaged enemies are also Displaced away from Sobek. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 80/125/170/215/260 Damage Scaling : 40% Intelligence Ability Video 3rd Ability - Sickening Strike Notes: The disease will spread to enemies within 3.2m of someone currently diseased. The Damage over Time does not trigger item effects. Sobek strikes in front of him. This strike deals 70 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage in a cone and applies Disease , reducing healing received for 5s. Enemies diseased take to enemies Bonus Magical Damage , take Reduced Healing , and can spread the disease for 2.5s. Each enemy god hit by the cone reduces this ability's cooldown by 1s and Heals Sobek up to 4. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Radius: 5.6 meters Cone Angle: 110 degrees Damage : 70/105/140/175/215 Damage Scaling : 30% Intelligence Heal : 22/29/36/43/50 God DoT Damage : 5/5.5/6/6.5/7% HP over 2.5 seconds Minion DoT Damage : 30/45/60/75/90 over 2.5 seconds Healing Reduction : 40% Ability Video Ultimate - Lurking in the Waters Notes: Lurking in the Water's deals 25% of its potential damage if emerging instantly. Sobek can pass through enemies and spawned walls while submerged. Sobek submerges, Slowing enemies nearby and granting you CC Immunity , Protections , and Mana Regen . After 4 seconds, emerge dealing 300 [80% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in range. Sobek can cancel this ability early, dealing less damage. Executes enemies below 10-25% HP , scaling with time submerged. Executed or killed enemies Heal Sobek and grant 25 permanent bonus Health . Cost: 80/90/100/110/120 mana Cooldown: 100 seconds Radius: 4.8 meters Damage : 300/450/600/750/900 Damage Scaling : 80% Intelligence Mana Per Second : 10% Protections : 20% Ability Video

Cost: 70/75/80/85/90 mana Cooldown: 16 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage : 70/110/150/190/230 Damage Scaling : 50% Intelligence Stun Duration : 0.47 seconds Ability Video 2nd Ability - Tail Whip Notes: If you have not chosen a target, Clay Soldiers will attack the nearest enemy or an enemy god that damages Nu Wa. Sobek spins his tail, dealing 80 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage in an area around Sobek. Damaged enemies are also Displaced away from Sobek. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 80/125/170/215/260 Damage Scaling : 40% Intelligence Ability Video 3rd Ability - Sickening Strike Notes: The disease will spread to enemies within 3.2m of someone currently diseased. The Damage over Time does not trigger item effects. Sobek strikes in front of him. This strike deals 70 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage in a cone and applies Disease , reducing healing received for 5s. Enemies diseased take to enemies Bonus Magical Damage , take Reduced Healing , and can spread the disease for 2.5s. Each enemy god hit by the cone reduces this ability's cooldown by 1s and Heals Sobek up to 4. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Radius: 5.6 meters Cone Angle: 110 degrees Damage : 70/105/140/175/215 Damage Scaling : 30% Intelligence Heal : 22/29/36/43/50 God DoT Damage : 5/5.5/6/6.5/7% HP over 2.5 seconds Minion DoT Damage : 30/45/60/75/90 over 2.5 seconds Healing Reduction : 40% Ability Video Ultimate - Lurking in the Waters Notes: Lurking in the Water's deals 25% of its potential damage if emerging instantly. Sobek can pass through enemies and spawned walls while submerged. Sobek submerges, Slowing enemies nearby and granting you CC Immunity , Protections , and Mana Regen . After 4 seconds, emerge dealing 300 [80% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in range. Sobek can cancel this ability early, dealing less damage. Executes enemies below 10-25% HP , scaling with time submerged. Executed or killed enemies Heal Sobek and grant 25 permanent bonus Health . Cost: 80/90/100/110/120 mana Cooldown: 100 seconds Radius: 4.8 meters Damage : 300/450/600/750/900 Damage Scaling : 80% Intelligence Mana Per Second : 10% Protections : 20% Ability Video. name: Sol Basic Attack Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Generates Heat. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage : 46 + 2.47 per level Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Heat Generated : 5 Ability Video Passive - Unstable Manifestation Notes: Ranges from 0 to 100 Heat. Heat starts depleting if you have not generated Heat within the last 6 seconds. Heat depleats over time at a rate of 6 Heat per 0.33 seconds. Gain Heat from hitting enemies with basic attacks or from using abilities to gain increased Strength, Intelligence, and Attack Speed . At Max Heat, increase your basic attack damage . Strength : 0.25 * Heat Intelligence : 0.25 * Heat Attack Speed : 0.3% * Heat Basic Attack Damage : 15% Ability Video 1st Ability - Radiance Notes: Pool scales from 1x radius at 0 Heat to 2x radius at 100 Heat. This ability hits 3 times over 3 seconds. Heals 6 times over 5 seconds. Create a Pool of Flames at your location. Heal yourself over time, and instantly generate Heat. The pool repeatedly deals Magical Damage to enemies in the area. The more Heat you have at the time the pool is created, the larger its area will be. Cost: 50/60/70/80/90 mana Cooldown: 11 seconds Radius: 2.08 meters Damage Per Tick : 30/50/70/90/110 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 30% Intelligence Heal Per Tick : 3% Missing Health Heat Generated : 30/40/50/60/70 Ability Video 2nd Ability - Stellar Burst Notes: Projectile stops and explodes on first enemy hit, walls, or max range. Can only trigger ability based items and effects. Grants Haste. Your next basic attack fires a projectile that explodes, then retracts, and generates Heat. Both the explosion and the retraction deal Magical Damage to enemies and Slows them. Cost: 50/60/70/80/90 mana Cooldown: 10 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 40/70/100/130/160 Damage Scaling : 45% Intelligence + 25% Strength Heat Generated : 10 Ability Video 3rd Ability - Disapparate Notes: You can cancel out of the Immune state early. This Immune state is Damage Immunity, Healing Immunity, CC Immunity, Untargettable, and makes you able to pass through allies, enemies, and Impediments. Gain Movement Speed, and Slow Immunity , begin creating a Trail of Flames behind you, and instantly generate Heat. The Trail persists and repeatedly deals Magical Damage to enemies in the area. After 3 seconds, detonate the Trail dealing Magical Damage , become Immune and unable to attack. Cost: 60 mana Cooldown: 16 seconds Radius: 1 meter Damage Per Tick : 20/40/60/80/100 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 25% Intelligence Explode Damage : 60/120/180/240/300 Explode Damage Scaling : 75% Intelligence Movement Speed : 20/22.5/25/27.5/30% Buff Duration : 3 seconds Immunity Duration : 3 seconds Heat Generated : 10 Ability Video Ultimate - Supernova Notes: Areas are selected every 0.18 seconds or when your targeter has moved more than 1.8 meters since the last area was selected. Channel to generate Heat, select 8 areas, then repeatedly deal Magical Damage to enemies in those areas. The first time an enemy is hit, they are Displaced . All subsequent hits deal decreased damage. You are CC Immune while Channeling. Cost: 100 mana Cooldown: 90 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 1.92 meters Damage : 150/200/250/300/350 Damage Scaling : 50% Intelligence Subsequent Damage : 30% Heat Generated : 40 Ability Video God Aspect [ edit

name: Susano Basic Attack Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center od the area will be hit. Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.25x damage and swing time. Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 1.92 meters Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Storm's Edge Notes: Enemies with 1-2 stacks have 10% reduced Strength. Enemies with 3-4 stacks are Slowed by 15% and maintain previous Debuff. Enemies with 5-6 stacks tale 10% increased damage and maintain previous Debuffs. Debuffs last 3s and refresh on a new application. Buff lasts 3s. Each attack of Storm Kata can trigger ability item effects. When you use an ability your next basic attack will debuff the enemy hit. Weave in basic attack hits between abilities to progressively stack the debuff. Ability Video 1st Ability - Storm Kata Notes: This ability Cooldown is increased by 1s for each additional attack used. Dash passes through all enemies. Strike and deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. This ability can be used a second time to Spin and Deal Physical Damage to enemies around you. This ability can be used a third time to Dash forward and deal Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 Cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10 seconds Strike Range: 4.8 meters Strike Cone Angle: 60 degrees Spin Radius: 4.8 meters Dash Range: 7 meters Dash Radius: 0.5 meters Strike and Spin Damage : 40/60/80/100/120 Strike and Spin Damage Scaling : 50% Strength Dash Damage : 30/50/70/90/110 Dash Damage Scaling : 30% Strength Ability Video 2nd Ability - Wind Siphon Notes: Enemies are Pulled to the location in front of you at the start of the attack. Deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. Enemies in the inner area are also Pulled towards you. Cost: 40/50/60/70/80 Cooldown: 16 seconds Range: 5.6 meters Cone Angle: 105 degrees Inner Cone Angle: 40 degrees Damage : 75/100/125/150/175 Damage Scaling : 70% Strength Ability Video 3rd Ability - Jet Stream Notes: The Whirlwind will travel with the enemy hit. This ability Cooldown is reduced by 4s when Teleporting to an enemy. Ability hits 6 times, over 3 seconds. Fire a projectile that stops on walls or the first enemy hit creating a Whirlwind which repeatedly deals Physical Damage . This ability can be used again to Teleport to the Whirlwind. Cooldown: 16 seconds Cost: 45/50/55/60/65 Damage Damage Scaling Ability Video Ultimate - Typhoon Notes: This ability automatically refires after 2s. This ability starts at 50% Size and Damage and increases over the duration. The Typhoon will travel in the duration Susano is facing on refire. Create a Typhoon which repeatedly deals Physical Damage . This ability can be used again to fire the Typhoon, dealing Physical Damage and Displacing enemies hit. Cost: 80/85/90/95/100 Cooldown: 90 seconds Start Radius: 3.2 meters Max Radius: 6.4 meters Damage Per Tick : 10/15/20/25/30 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 10% Strength Damage : 180/240/300/360/420 Damage Scaling : 100% Strength Ability Video

name: The Morrigan Basic Attack Notes: The Morrigan has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in an order of 1 / 1 / 1x damage and fire time. The final fire explodes on target, applying Doomsayer. Throw a projectile forward that deals Magical Damage to enemies hit. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.8 meters Damage : 43 + 2.33 per level Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Doomsayer Notes: The DoT damage from this ability is now counted as ability damage. The Morrigan's Basic Attacks has a 3 hit chain. The final Basic Attack explodes, dealing 9% of the targets Health over 3s. Ability Video 1st Ability - Deadly Aspects Notes: The buildup for this ability does not break Confusion's Stealth. Firing any other ability (including Purification beads) will cancel the wind-up of this ability. The Morrigan deals Magical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you after a brief buildup. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Cone Angle: 45 degrees Damage : 105/160/215/270/325 Damage Scaling : 90% Intelligence Stun Duration : 0.8 seconds Ability Video 2nd Ability - Dark Omen Notes: Projectile deals Minion Damage to non-god entities, these entities cannot be marked with Dark Omen. The Morrigan deals the mark trigger damage, even if another god triggers it. She can receive kills this way. The Morrigan fires a projectile that deals Magical Damage . Enemy gods hit are marked. The mark triggers for Magical Damage when that god is damaged by any god ability. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 7 seconds Range: 11.2 meters Radius: 0.8 meters Initial Damage : 40/70/100/130/160 Initial Damage Scaling : 55% Intelligence Mark Damage : 40/70/100/130/160 Mark Damage Scaling : 55% Intelligence Minion Damage : 65/125/185/245/305 Minion Damage Scaling : 60% Intelligence Ability Video 3rd Ability - Confusion Notes: When the clone is damaged, it will appear as an illusion. It will change appearance and lose its health bar. The clone grants vision around itself. Taking damage while stealthed breaks the effect. The Morrigan Stealths immediately and gains Movement Speed . The Morrigan sends a clone of herself in the direction she is currently facing. Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 15 seconds Movement Speed : 30/32.5/35/37.5/40% Buff Duration : 3/3.5/4/4.5/5 seconds Clone Lifetime : 5 seconds Ability Video Ultimate - Changeling Notes: If the god The Morrigan transforms into has an Ultimate Cooldown longer than this Ultimate's Cooldown, she uses the transformed targets Cooldown instead. The Morrigan will copy all their abilities and active items, all with no cooldown. The Morrigan will copy their ability ranks. If her level is different to the transform target's it will use the order they ranked their abilities, filling with Auto Skill as needed. If The Morrigan is in the middle of firing an ability when the transform times out, she will detransform the moment that ability fire ends. The Morrigan retains her Jungle Buffs and Fire Giant buff while transformed, while also gaining the buffs that her transformation currently has. (excluding Elixir's, which she doesn't gain nor retain on transform.) The Morrigan can use the consumables of her selected Transformation, such as Wards, Runic Bomb, and Obsidian Dagger. Detransformation cleanses all currently applied Crowd Control effects, immediately causing The Morrigan to detransform. Transformation cleanses ALL effects, including allied ones such as Khepri's Ultimate, Scarab's Blessing. These effects are still applied to The Morrigan's base form, so if she dies while Blessed, she will immediately detransform and be revived. The Morrigan selects a target to transform into. The Morrigan gains access to their abilities and items for 10 seconds. Cost: 100 mana Cooldown: 140/130/120/110/100 seconds Ability Video God Aspect [ edit

name: Thor Basic Attack Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. Range: 1.92 meters Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage : 43 + 2.32 per level Damage Scaling : 100% Strength pr Inhand Power + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Warrior's Madness Thor gains Strength for each enemy god near Thor, up to 3. After using Berserker's Barrage or Anvil of Dawn, Thor gains Thunderstruck . While Thunderstruck , Mjolnir deals bonus Physical Damage . Thunderstruck's damage can arc up to 2 nearby enemies. Range: 3.2 meters Radius: 8.8 meters Physical Damage : 1.25 Per Level + 4 Physical Damage : 10% Strength Bonus Strength : 10 Ability Video EmbedVideo is missing a required parameter. 1st Ability - Mjolnir's Attunement Notes: Mjolnir must be in a valid location for Thor to be able to teleport to it. Thor cannot teleport to Mjolnir if afflicted by Hard CC, Cripples or while firing a different ability. Thor throws Mjolnir forwards, dealing 50 [35% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies as it travels. When it reaches max range it flies back to you. Gods hit by Mjolnir returning to Thor take 200% damage. Minions take 100% damage. Thor can reactivate while Mjolnir is traveling to Teleport to and catch Mjolnir. Cost: 55/60/65/70/75 mana Cooldown: 13 seconds Range: 11.2 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage : 50/95/140/185/230 Damage Scaling : 35% Strength Ability Video 2nd Ability - Tectonic Rift Notes: The fissure appears over 0.3s, stunning and damaging enemies as it appears. Thor slams Mjolnir down creating a fissure, dealing 30 [20% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies as it erupts. Enemies hit are also Stunned . The fissure blocks movement, but allows projectiles to pass through. Thor can reactivate to bring the fissure down early. Cost: 60 mana Cooldown: 17/16.5/16/15.5/15 seconds Range: 11.2 meters Damage : 30/50/70/90/110 Damage Scaling : 20% Strength Stun Duration : 1.2/1.25/1.3/1.35/1.4 Ability Video 3rd Ability - Berserker Barrage Thor spins, dealing 30 [40% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies around Thor. Thor spins twice before unleashing a final cone attack that deals 50 [70% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in front of Thor. Thor is Displacement Immune while Channeling. Thor gains 3s of Thunderstruck , causing Mjolnir hits to arc and damage nearby enemies. Cost: 55/60/70/75/80 mana Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10 seconds Range: 3.2 meters Cone Angle: 180 degrees Spin Damage : 30/50/70/90/110 Spin Damage Scaling : 40% Strength Cone Damage : 50/70/90/110/130 Cone Damage Scaling : 70% Strength Ability Video Ultimate - Anvil of Dawn Notes: If Thor is not aimed at a valid location, Thor will land at the closest valid point when aiming times out. Thor flies into the sky. Thor chooses a location dealing 100 [85% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies upon landing. Enemies hit are Stunned . Thor is CC Immune during this ability. Thor is Thunderstruck for after 6s after landing, causing Mjolnir to arc and damage nearby enemies. Cost: 80/90/100/110/120 mana Cooldown: 110/105/100/95/90 seconds Range: 32 meters Radius: 3.2 meters Damage : 100/165/230/295/360 Damage Scaling : 85% Strength Stun Duration : 1.5 seconds Ability Video

name: Vulcan Basic Attack Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Fires a projectile that deals 5 Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage Scaling : 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Master Craftsman Vulcan has access to a variety of Mods in the shop that affects his abilities. There are 3 sets of mods available at different levels. Vulcan can only have one Mod from each set. Hitting an enemy god with an ability grants Vulcan increased Movement Speed and Mana Regen for 5s. Buff Duration : 5 seconds Mana Regen : 3 Movement Speed : 15% Ability Video 1st Ability - Backfire Notes: Vulcan fires a projectile that causes him to Dash back and deal 90 [80% Intelligence] Magical Damage to all enemies it hits, marking the first god that is hit. Inferno Cannons will priotize hitting the marked god and deal 15% more damage to them for 4s. Cost: 40/45/50/55/60 mana Cooldown: 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage : 90/135/180/225/270 Damage Scaling : 80% Intelligence Ability Video 2nd Ability - Inferno Cannon Vulcan creates an Inferno Cannon that shoots projectiles every 1s at an enemy in front of it, dealing 45 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage . It lasts until destroyed or another is placed. Inherits Vulcan's penetrations but in addition to having 25% base Penetration. Does not trigger item effects. Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Range: 9.6m Damage : 45/70/95/120/145 Damage Scaling : 40% Intelligence Movement Speed : 220/300/380/460/540 Ability Video 3rd Ability - Magma Bomb Vulcan lobs a projectile that explodes on impact with the ground, dealing 80 [90% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Displacing enemies in an area. Enemies are displaced up and away from the explosion. Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana Cooldown: 10 seconds Range: 9.6 meters Radius: 2.4 meters Damage : 80/130/180/230/280 Damage Scaling : 90% Intelligence Ability Video Ultimate - Earthshaker Vulcan launches a projectile that explodes on impact with the ground, dealing 320 [120% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in its area. Deals more damage the further the projectile travels. Deals 1.5x the total at max travel time. Cost: 80/90/100/110/120 mana Cooldown: 90/85/80/75/70 seconds Range: 19.2 meters Radius: 4.8 meters Outer Ring Damage : 320/420/520/620/720 Outer Ring Scaling : 120% Intelligence Ability Video

name: Yemoja Basic Attack Notes: Projectile stops on the first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Yemoja basic attacks can hit allies with an increased radius, applying Omi Healing. Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Range: 8.8m Radius: 0.48m Ally Radius: 0.8m Damage Scaling : 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Omi Notes: Additional Omi is gained at levels 5, 10 and 15. Cooldown Reduction increase Omi regeneration. Yemoja uses Omi to cast spells instead of Mana. Starting with 7, earning up to 10 Yemoja's water based attacks and abilities can hit allies, providing them a Heal for 1 + 0.2 per Level every 0.5s for 6s. Ability Video 1st Ability - Bouncing Bubble Notes: Enemies take reduced damage if hit by both large bubbles. All Allies hit will also gain Omi Healing. This ability changes to Moonstrike when used. Yemoja tosses a bubble that bounces twice, dealing 55 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Slows enemies before exploding into smaller bubbles. Small bubbles deal 27.5 [15% Intelligence] Magical Damage . Cost: 2 Omi Cooldown: 0 seconds Range: 5.6 meters Radius: 2.24 meters Small Bubble Radius: 1 meter Damage : 55/90/125/160/195 Damage Scaling : 30% Intelligence Small Bubble Damage : 27.5/45/62.5/80/97.5 Small Bubble Damage Scaling : 15% Intelligence Slow : 30% Slow Duration : 1 seconds Ability Video Alt. 1st Ability - Moonstrike Notes: Enemy structures hit by the final strike are stunned for 2s. This ability changes to Bouncing Bubble when used. Yemoja lets the moon strike multiple times at a location, dealing 40 [20% Intelligence] Magical Damage before a final strike dealing 65 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Stunning enemies for 1s. Allies in the final strike have their Omi Healing replaced with a buff providing increased Attack Speed and Basic Attack Damage. Cost: 2 Omi Radius: 1.6. meters Final Radius: 2.4 meters Range: 10.4 meters Final Damage : 65/105/145/185/225 Final Damage Scaling : 40% Intelligence Damage : 40/65/90/115/140 Damage Scaling : 20% Intelligence Attack Speed : 30% Basic Attack Damage : 20/25/30/35/40 Buff Duration : 4 seconds Ability Video 2nd Ability - Mending Waters Notes: Projectile stops on walls or first allied gods. Allies hit will also gain Omi Healing. Yemoja fires a water wave, dealing 65 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies. This wave stops and bounces between allied gods, Healing then them for 20 Bonus Health and providing them a 30 [2% MaxHealth] Health Shield . This ability also does bonus damage to enemy Health Shields. Cost: 3 Omi Cooldown: 0 seconds Range: 9.6 meters Radius: 1.12 meters Damage : 65/95/125/155/180 Damage Scaling : 40% Intelligence Heal : 20/40/60/80/100 Shield Health : 30/55/80/105/130 Shield Health Scaling : 2% Max Health Bonus Damage to Shields : 2/2/2/2/3x Protection Reduced : -4/-5/-6/-7/-8 Ability Video 3rd Ability - Riptide Notes: Allies that use the ring also gain Omi Healing. Create a water ring that Knocks Back anyone entering it. Allies travel further and gain Movement Speed and Protections for 3s. Enemies are Slowed for 2s. Placing the ring at the maximum distance reverses its direction. Cost: 3 Omi Cooldown: 0 seconds Range: 9.6 meters Radius: 2.24 meters Movement Speed : 10/12.5/15/17.5/20% Protections : 20/25/30/35/40 Slow : 10% Ability Video Ultimate - River's Rebuke Notes: Enemies are slowed by 60%, decreasing to normal over 2s. Yemoja gains half of her missing Omi immediately but the duration of regeneration buff is decreased based on the amount restored. Yemoja conjures two large walls of water that block enemy movement and projectiles. After a delay they crash down, dealing 250 [70% Intelligence] Magical Damage , Trembling and Slowing enemies hit. Allies impacted by the crashing waves gain Omi Healing and Moonstrike's buff. You gain a buff of increased Omi over time using this ability. Cost: 0 Omi Cooldown: 140/135/120/115/110 seconds Range: 6 meters Radius: 1 meters Damage : 250/320/390/460/530 Damage Scaling : 70% Intelligence Ability Video God Aspect [ edit

Range: 1.92 meters Cone Angle: 120 degrees Damage : 46 + 2.47 per level Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Frostbite Notes: Frostbite's effect stacks with Critical Strikes. Your abilities apply Frostbite, causing enemies to take more basic attack damage from you and to deal less damage to you. Damage : 185% Strength + 37% Intelligence Reduced Damage Dealt : 15% Ability Video 1st Ability - Ice Wall Notes: The Wall Impedes all characters. Create a Wall at your feet to Displace yourself up and forward. Displaces enemies up and away from the Wall. Reactivate to destroy the Wall early. Create a Wall that Displaces enemies on creation. Applies Frostbite to Displaced enemies. Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana Cooldown: 13 seconds Range: 11.2 meters Radius: 3.25 meters Lifetime: 2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5 seconds Ability Video 2nd Ability - Glacial Strike Notes: Damaging area starts at Ymir and moves away over time. You are Slowed by 42.5% during activation. Deal Magical Damage and Slow enemies. Applies Frostbite on succesful hit. Cost: 45/50/55/60/65 mana Cooldown: 8/7.5/7/6.5/6 seconds Range: 6 meters Radius: 3.6 meters Damage : 60/105/150/195/240 Damage Scaling : 70% Intelligence + 55% Strength Slow : 25% Slow Duration : 2 seconds Ability Video 3rd Ability - Frost Breath Notes: You are Rooted during activation. Deal Magical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you. Applies Frostbite on succesful hit. Cost: 40/50/60/70/80 mana Cooldown: 16/15.5/15/14.5/14 seconds Cone Angle: 90 degrees Damage : 50/85/120/155/190 Damage Scaling : 55% Intelligence Stun Duration : 0.8/1/1.2/1.4/1.6 seconds Ability Video Ultimate - Shards of Ice Notes: Damage scales linearly from 35% + 0.03% Intelligence to 100% based on Channel time. Max Channel time of 3 seconds. You are Rooted while Channeling. Channel to Slow enemies around you. Deal a burst of Magical Damage when the Channel is complete. Applies Frostbite immediately to enemies in the area. You are CC Immune while Channeling. Cost: 80/90/100/110/120 mana Cooldown: 90/85/80/75/70 seconds Radius: 5.6 meters Damage : 500/650/800/950/1100 Damage Scaling : 160% Intelligence + 30% Protections Slow : 40% Ability Video. Type: Basic Attack

name: Zeus Basic Attack Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Applies Charges. Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.48 meters Damage : 44 + 2.42 per level Damage Scaling : 100% Strength + 20% Intelligence Ability Video Passive - Overcharge Deal damage to apply Charges. Enemies take increased basic attack damage from you for each Charge they have. Damage Increase : 20% Per Stack Debuff Duration : 5 seconds Max Debuff Stacks : 3 Ability Video 1st Ability - Chain Lightning Notes: Projectile stops on walls. Fire a projectile that hits and enemy and then chains to nearby enemies. Any enemies hit are dealt Magical Damage , Slowed , and receive a Charge Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana Cooldown: 12 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 0.56 meters Damage : 40/70/100/130/160 Damage Scaling : 60% Intelligence Slow : 20% Bounces: 5 Ability Video 2nd Ability - Thunderclap Deal Magical Damage and apply a Charge to enemies around you, then gain increased Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and reduced basic attack Movement Penalty . Cost: 50/60/70/80/90 mana Cooldown: 15 seconds Radius: 3.2m Damage: 80/130/180/230/280 Damage Scaling: 80% Intelligence Attack Speed: 15/20/25/30/35% Movement Speed: 10/12.5/15/17.5/20% Buff Duration: 5s Ability Video 3rd Ability - Detonate Charge Notes: This ability cannot be activated unless an enemy has a Charge. Damage is multiplied by 1/1.7/2.4 based on the number of Charges. Activate to deal Magical Damage to enemies for each Charge, and Stun enemies that had max Charges. Cost: 70/75/80/85/90 mana Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12 seconds Damage : 50/80/110/140/170 Damage Scaling : 30% Intelligence Stun Duration : 0.5 seconds Ability Video Ultimate - Lightning Storm Deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in the area, applying a Charge on each hit. Cost: 100 mana Cooldown: 90 seconds Range: 8.8 meters Radius: 4.8 meters Damage Per Tick : 100/130/160/190/220 Damage Scaling Per Tick : 55% Intelligence Ability Video
